alert.note: Alert for Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 4:20PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Geneva County through 445 PM CDT... At 419 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Geneva, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Geneva, Hartford, Slocomb, Malvern, Coffee Springs, Black, Chancellor, Kellys Crossroads, Eunola, Lytle, High Bluff, Highfalls, Marl, Dundee, Bald Hill, Geneva Municipal A/P, Vaughanville, Hendrix Crossroad, Bailey Crossroad and Somerset. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
